name: Conqueror's Blade: Season IX - Tyranny
storyline: Where there was once peace, chaos now reigns. Choose to start your quest in the Longting region, Maoyang, or Ostaria before taking the fight to the stage for the main conflict of Season IX: the Borderlands. Taking back control of the legendary Conqueror’s City from the ruthless Tyrant is your end goal, with skirmishes waged in twice-weekly Territory Wars before the final showdown.
summary: The new Seasonal Campaign invites you to rise up against an evil Tyrant with your rebel armies, take back the devastated Borderlands, and claim epic rewards from the Battle Pass.
